mapper.select: SELECT r.role FROM roles r JOIN user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id};
select distinct p.permission from permissions p join role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id join roles r on r.id = rp.role_id join user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{id}
